item.title: ACETAMINOPHEN
item.description:
DrugBank ID: db00316
DrugCentral: acetaminophen
Synonymous :4-(acetylamino)phenol | 4-acetamidophenol | 4’-hydroxyacetanilide | acenol | acetaminofén | acétaminophène | apap | n-acetyl-p-aminophenol | p-acetamidophenol | p-acetaminophenol | p-acetylaminophenol | p-hydroxy-acetanilid | p-hydroxyacetanilide | p-hydroxyphenolacetamide | paracétamol | paracetamol | paracetamolum


Drug Sentece Context


Table 1. Analysis of context sentence of acetaminophen gene in 9 abstracts.

pmid sentence
32293020 Based on the evidence to date, there are several treatment options to consider for the relief of fever (acetaminophen, NSAID, oral glucocorticoids), cough (morphine), breathlessness (morphine, oxygen, fan), anxiety (benzodiazepines) and pain (NSAID, morphine).
32303650 The first patient was treated with intravenous immunoglobulin and the second, with acetaminophen.
32404451 Ibuprofen or acetaminophen for fever and pain can be given.
32447629 Paracetamol (acetaminophen) has been proposed as an alternative to NSAIDs but there are issues with liver toxicity at high doses.
32460369 Although based on existing evidence, NSAIDs have been effective in treating respiratory infections caused by influenza and rhinovirus, since there is no clinical trial on COVID-19 and case-reports and clinical experiences are indicative of elongation of treatment duration and exacerbation of the clinical course of patients with COVID-19, it is recommended to use substitutes such as acetaminophen for controlling fever and inflammation and be cautious about using NSAIDs in management of COVID-19 patients until there are enough evidence.
32474064 Additionally, acetylsalicylic acid (ASA) and acetaminophen (APAP) were discovered alleviating NETs formation.
32505846 Over the counter antipyretics such as ibuprofen and acetaminophen are often taken by individuals to reduce the discomfort of fever. […] Studies show that ibuprofen demonstrates superior efficacy in fever reduction compared to acetaminophen.
32526083 During the hospitalization, 86 patients developed de novo LFTs abnormality, which was associated with the use of tocilizumab, lopinavir/ritonavir and acetaminophen and not clearly associated with the composite endpoint.
